attributes.action: immediately cut spending on government TV advertisements
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the government should cut spending on information adverts that various government departments produce. Recently there has been a clear rise in the number of adverts that advertise government political objectives particularly around education & NHS, this is not only a waste of tax payers money but could be perceived as political engineering in a run up to an election.
